title: safar1980
author: safar1980
content: RTX 3070 Upgraded to 16 GB.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W6uaUHBNFOUNVIDIA RTX 3060 8GB becomes RTX 3060 12GBhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2XNolRHVFOETest results GeForce RTX 3060 8 Gb GeForce RTX 3060 12 GBThe result of adding memory is more than 20% performance.I don't know how effective it is in mining, but finally someone hacked Nvidia.

comments.author: Truth855
comments.body: Quote from: safar1980 on May 01, 2023, 03:57:34 PMRTX 3070 Upgraded to 16 GB.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W6uaUHBNFOUNVIDIA RTX 3060 8GB becomes RTX 3060 12GBhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2XNolRHVFOETest results GeForce RTX 3060 8 Gb GeForce RTX 3060 12 GBThe result of adding memory is more than 20% performance.I don't know how effective it is in mining, but finally someone hacked Nvidia.How much less does 3060 give, which is 128 bit with 8GB?
